info.name: 10a)  EPS Issue Codes
info.description:
See ticket AEA-475 and Pages 67&68 of the Compliance spec

https://nhsd-confluence.digital.nhs.uk/display/APIMC/Error+Handling

EPS Issue Codes:
https://simplifier.net/nhsdigitalspine/eps-issuecode

CodeSystem: https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/EPS-IssueCode

Old EPS Code	New EPS Code	Display	FHIR Issue Type	Response Code	Definition

0001
PATIENT_DECEASED	Patient is recorded as dead	business-rule	422	Not applicable to prescribing systems Note. The Spine will not reject a prescription for a dead patient however the requirement to check PDS for death status before prescribing prevents this scenario occurring.

0002
DUPLICATE_PRESCRIPTION_ID	Duplicate prescription ID exists	duplicate	422	The System must create a new prescription UUID and re-submit the prescription to the Spine.

0003
MISSING_DIGITAL_SIGNATURE	Digital signature not found	business-rule	422	The System must create and apply a digital signature to the prescription and re-submit the prescription to the Spine

0009	
INVALID_MESSAGE
Invalid Message	structure	400	
The prescription message has failed structural validation at the Spine. A defect report should be raised against the local System or the Spine (whichever is in error). The prescriber must be notified accordingly to use a paper FP10 prescription.

0010
INVALID_NUMBER_MEDICATIONREQUESTS	Number of items on a prescription should be between 1 and 4	business-rule	422	The prescriber must be notified accordingly and asked to split the items across separate prescriptions.

0018
MISMATCH_AUTHORISED_REPEAT_COUNT	Mismatch in authorised repeat counts	business-rule	422	The “repeatNumber” attribute exists at both the prescription and item level. An item cannot be authorised for more repeats than the prescription.

0019
INVALID_REPEAT_COUNT	Repeat count should be between 1 and 99	business-rule	422	The maximum “high” value for the “repeatNumber” attribute is 99.

5008
DUPLICATE_MEDICATIONREQUEST_ID	Duplicate item ID exists	duplicate 	422	The System must create a new line item UUID and re-submit the prescription to the Spine.

5009
INVALID_CHECK_DIGIT	Error in check digit	value	400	The System must re-calculate / correct the check digit and re-submit the prescription to the Spine.

exec: console.log("Repeat Dispensing Section - Number of Requests 100");
pm.test("Body matches and contains repeatNumber", function () {
pm.test("Number of Repeat Prescriptions Allowed is 'Repeat Number High value' and is equal to 6 in this example (Element Attribute)",
let value = $('ParentPrescription > pertinentInformation1 > pertinentPrescription > repeatNumber > high').attr('value');

request.description:
At the line item level set the ‘high.value’ attribute to the number of authorised
repeats for that line item. The EPS supports values up to 99. The System must
support at least a maximum value of 26 to allow for 6 months of weekly
prescriptions.
